verses.roman:
rātre asi' śivānanda bhojanera kale
'kukkura pāñāche bhāta?'--sevake puchile

synonyms: rātre āsi'-returning at night; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; bhojanera kāle—at the time of eating; kukkura—the dog; pāñāche—has gotten; bhāta—rice; sevake—from the servant; puchile—he inquired.
translation: At night, when Śivānanda Sena returned and was taking his meal, he inquired from the servant whether the dog had gotten its meals.
